title: Smoked sausages of bovine meat produced in North Macedonia as a source of pro-technological lactic acid bacteria and coagulase-negative cocci
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Giorgia Rampanti, Daniela Nikolovska Nedelkoska, Tatjana Kalevska, Tanja Stojanovska, Joanna Harasym, Federica Cardinali, Agnieszka Orkusz, Vesna MilanoviÄ‡, Cristiana Garofalo, Alessio Bonifazi, Lucia Aquilanti, Andrea Osimani
